text: Bodhi graduated right at the beginning of what would be known as the Australia Wars. Bodhi was eventually apprehended on 02/21/2174, during an altercation between Australian police and a cell of rebel forces. During this incident Mr Knight was seen conducting on field emergency aid on known terrorists, and he continued working even after being shot in the shoulder. Mr. Knight has admitted to participating in many of the insisting riots against the Three World Empire and the Australian Government, though he would not give up his constituents when offered time communed off of his sentence. He was sentenced to 60 years in prison without the chance for parole.
